short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes notifications count from the tab title for user-specified websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab Title Cleaner removes notification numbers (e.g., (5)) from the titles of specific webpages. It runs in the background and keeps your browser tabs clean and distraction-free. Just add the URLs you want to target, and it handles the rest.
— Clean and tidy browser tabs.
— Eliminate distracting numbers.
— Simple setup with no hassle.
